trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: When you create a UserPreferenceChangingEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 UserPreferenceChangingEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event-handling method, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理方法关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event-handling method is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
